content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"There is a news portal in the company that is devoted to the life and work of your colleagues – \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://info.epam.com/en/news.html\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Information portal\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Important news on EPAM employees' work and recreational activities is published there, including: initiatives the company supports, important notifications about the improvement of the existing internal systems and the appearance of new ones, and photo-reports and summaries of interesting events. In short, this portal details how our large team develops and lives. The articles on the Information Portal are published in both English and Russian.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/be983015-cdba-4c5d-a631-32fd752a56c0/16.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1285,\"height\":569}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"There
